attributes.action: Force all overhead rail companies and Network rail to reduce the gap between trains and platforms to prevent any more deaths like that of our son Simon Slade who was killed at Gidea Park station on the 11th Jan 07
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our son Simon who was 6ft 4in and 14.5 stone died when he slipped and fell into the gap between the train and platform at Gidea Park station. The Railway health and safety inspector states that the gap is within gudelines and he is satisfied with the condition

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Force all overhead rail companies and Network rail to reduce the gap between trains and platforms to prevent any more deaths like that of our son Simon Slade who was killed at Gidea Park station on the 11th Jan 07"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13322.asp

Prime Minister's Office
